metadata.title: CVE-2024-4032 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The “ipaddress” module contained incorrect information about whethercertain IPv4 and IPv6 addresses were designated as “globally reachable” or“private”. This affected the is_private and is_global properties of theipaddress.IPv4Address, ipaddress.IPv4Network, ipaddress.IPv6Address, andipaddress.IPv6Network classes, where values wouldn’t be returned inaccordance with the latest information from the IANA Special-PurposeAddress Registries.CPython 3.12.4 and 3.13.0a6 contain updated information from theseregistries and thus have the intended behavior.

criterions.comment: python2.7 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
python3.6 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
python3.7 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
python3.8 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
